gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka

Class KafkaWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.KafkaWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class KafkaWrapper
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Wrapper class that contains two alternative Kakfa APIs: an old low-level Scala-based API, and a new API. The new API has not been implemented since it's not ready to be open sourced.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static KafkaWrapper create(State state)
        Create a KafkaWrapper based on the given type of Kafka API and list of Kafka brokers.
        Parameters:
        state - A State object that should contain a list of comma separated Kafka brokers in property "kafka.brokers". It may optionally specify whether to use the new Kafka API by setting use.new.kafka.api=true.
